mapper.select: select distinct left(dongCode,5) as gugunCode, gugunName from address where dongCode like concat(#{sidoCode},'%')
select distinct dongName from address where dongCode like concat(#{gugunCode},'%')
select a.dongCode, a.sidoName,a.gugunName,a.dongName,a.lat,a.lng from address a, interest_addr i where i.userid=#{id} and a.dongCode=i.dongCode
select a.dongCode, a.sidoName,a.gugunName,a.dongName,a.lat,a.lng from address a, interest_addr i where i.userid=#{id} and a.dongCode=i.dongCode order by create_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into interest_addr values(#{userid}, (select dongCode from address where dongName = #{dongName} and dongCode like concat(#{dongCode},'%') limit 1), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: delete from interest_addr where userid=#{userid} and dongCode=#{dongCode}
